name: Taqueria kesarricas
address: Walton av and, E 161st St, Bronx, NY 10451, USA

reviews.text: I‚Äôve been craving good Mexican food for ages. This did not disappoint! The flavour is insane. The Quesabrilla are stuffed full. Double wrapped. The consume is delicious. Lick the bowl clean good. Tepache was perfectly fermented. I‚Äôm in town to see a few games at yankee stadium upcoming this weekend and happy to pass the food truck when I do. I will definitely be stopping by again! Good value for the food! Just noting I did get the Tepache with the food. And I did get extra lime, cilantro, and onions. I wasn‚Äôt expecting them to be as stuffed as they were lol. Definitely wasn‚Äôt required, but it didn‚Äôt go to waste!
i got the roasted pork tostada and it was really good! best mexican food in the area.
This food truck is the best in the area! I got the tostada with pastor and it was AMAZING. The meat and ingredients were so fresh!
legit. delicious food and friendly staff.
Best street tacos in the Bronx, a food truck right on Randall Ave. I stop here any and everytime I‚Äôm in town!!! #TellEmKnoxSentYa
This place is legit the best Mexican food place in the area, I loved the quesadillas here, 100% would recommend people coming here

I gave this place an excellent review the first time. Me and my husband use to love the food here. The woman would make excellent ‚Ä¶ HANDS DOWN best tacos I‚Äôve ever had.
